testimonials_title: What Our Clients Say About Nanky Beauty
review_1_quote: My experience at Nanky Beauty in District 2 exceeded expectations! The technicians were meticulous, and the result is stunning and lasts a very long time.
review_2_quote: The space in Thao Dien is luxurious and absolutely relaxing. This is the only place I trust with my eyes in HCMC.
review_3_quote: I've tried many lash salons in District 2, but Nanky has the most personalized, high-level lash design style. My eyes are completely transformed!
review_4_quote: The ultra-soft Feather Lashes are so light; I barely feel them. A truly premium lash experience.
review_5_quote: The Master's technique is very professional; I didn't feel any stinging or discomfort. The best lash service in Thao Dien.
review_6_quote: The Korean glue holds extremely well; my lashes lasted twice as long. Affordable price for such high-end quality.
service_0_desc: The perfect choice for an elegant, natural look. A popular style for clients in District 2 for daily wear.
service_1_desc: Creates impressive thickness for a captivating, sharp look. Our most beloved volume lash service in Thao Dien, HCMC.
service_2_desc: A combination of Classic and Volume, custom designed for your eye shape. A unique style only at Nanky Beauty District 2.
service_3_desc: Professional infill and removal process, ensuring absolute safety for your natural lashes and eye health.
service_4_desc: High-end lash perm using imported solutions. Provides long-lasting curl.
service_5_desc: Eyebrow Lamination is a beauty technique that makes eyebrows look thicker, sharper, and more defined.
service_6_desc: The lash removal service is done gently and safely for the eye area, using professional solution and experienced technicians.
service_7_desc: Custom designed according to each client's eye shape, style, and aura. Technicians meticulously choose the right curl, thickness, and shape to enhance natural beauty while being captivating.
service_8_desc: Helps restore lashes after a period of extension, replacing shed lashes to keep the set thick, even, and as natural as new.
service_9_desc: Relaxing service combined with acupressure massage, helps blood circulation and relieves stress.
